Hello guys,
I want to use the signle send API in my workflow custom code action, and i read in the documentation that i can pass custom properties to it. 
I have personalization tokens in the body of the email i want to send  If i add those custom properties to the single send API body, will it populate the variables in my email body ?
The problem is i don't have access to this addon already so i can't test, and i want to make sure this is how it works before i finalize my purchace.

Hi everyone, right now I'm using Segment (CDP) to trigger emails (we were using Iterable for email automation) our plan for Q1 is migrate our email delivery to HubSpot, my question is, what do you recommend for better metrics? Integrate SMPT API in our app or send emails with workflows triggering events from segment, we can generate the same analytics? either ways we can capture all user activity (clicks, email opened, etc)
